Installation¶

Automatic installation¶

To install AGOX clone the repository from and install using pip

(user) $ pip install .

Manual installation¶

AGOX relies on a number of Python packages, usage requires the following packages to be installed

  • ase

  • numpy

  • matplotlib

  • sklearn

  • mpi4py

  • dscribe

  • Cython==0.29.23

  • cymem==2.0.5
